trans-unit.source: Computes aggregates over a sequence of <see langword="double" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 計算 <see langword="double" /> 值序列的彙總。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="double" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see langword="double" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the average of a sequence of <see langword="double" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="double" /> 值序列的平均。

trans-unit.source: Computes the average value over a sequence of <see langword="double" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 計算 <see langword="double" /> 值序列的平均值。

trans-unit.source: The average result.
trans-unit.target: 平均的結果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a sequence of <see langword="double" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="double" /> 值的序列。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a sequence of <see langword="double" /> values is empty.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see langword="double" /> 值序列是否為空。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the result is empty; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果是空的，則傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="double" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see langword="double" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the <paramref name="value" /> parameter to the existing result if the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is greater than the existing result.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 參數大於現有結果，則將 <paramref name="value" /> 參數指派給該現有結果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum value of a sequence of <see langword="double" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="double" /> 值序列中的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum result.
trans-unit.target: 最大值的結果。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="double" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see langword="double" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the <paramref name="value" /> parameter to the existing result if the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is less than the existing result.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 參數小於現有結果，則將 <paramref name="value" /> 參數指派給該現有結果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the minimum value of a sequence of <see langword="double" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="double" /> 值序列中的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The minimum result.
trans-unit.target: 最小值的結果。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="double" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see langword="double" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see langword="Double" /> value to the existing result..
trans-unit.target: 將 <see langword="Double" /> 值加入至現有的結果中。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sum of a sequence of <see langword="double" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="double" /> 值序列的總和。

trans-unit.source: The sum of all results.
trans-unit.target: 所有結果的總和。
